verses.content: Chuongchun, Israel chu a nei po po leh a suok a, Beer-seba chu a tlung a, a pa Isak Pathien kuomah inthâwinahai ân hlân a.
Chun, Pathienin zâna a mang- haia chun Israel chu a biek a, “Jakob, Jakob,” a tih a. Ama chun, “Hitaka hi ka um,” a tih a.
Chun, ama chun, “Kei Pathien, i pa Pathien chu ka nih: Aiguptaa zu fe chu ṭi naw rawh: chutaka chun chi ropuitakah ka siem ding che a nih.
Aiguptaa chun nang leh fe vêng ka ta; chun, zu ṭhuoi kai nâwk ngei ngei ka ti che: chun, Josef chun i thi pha i mit a siempêk ding che a nih,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu Beer- sebaa inthawk chun a suok a, Israel naupahai chun an pa Jakob le an nauhai le an nuhmeihai chu chuong- na dinga Pharao tawlailîr inphurhaia khan an inchuongtir a.
Chuongchun, Jakob le a thlahai po po chun, Kanaana an them suok,an ranhai le an thuomhnawhai chu an sawm a, Aigupta chu an tlung tah a.
Jakob chun a naupasalhai, a tupahai, a naunuhmeihai, a tunuhai, a thlahai po po chu, Aiguptaa chun a lûtpui tâwl tah a.
Chun, hieng hi Israel thla Aiguptaa lût, Jakob le a naupasalhai hming chu a nih: Reuben, Jakob nau lutîr chu.
Chun, Reuben naupasalhai chu: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron le Karmi.
Simeon naupasalhai chu Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Johar le Kanaan nuhmei le an naupasal Saula.
Levi naupasalhai chu Gerson, Kohath le Merari.
Juda naupasalhai chu Er, Onan, Selah, Perez le Zera. (Er le Onan chu Kanaan ramah an thi tah). Perez naupasalhai chu Hezron le Hamul.
Issakar naupasalhai chu Tola, Puva, Job le Simron.
Zebulun naupasalhai chu Sered, Elon le Jahleel.
Hienghai po hi Leah naupahai, a naunu Dina leh Paddan-aram rama Jakob a neipêkhai chu an nih: a naupasalhai le a naunuhmeihai po po chu sâwmthum pathum an nih.
Gad naupasalhai chu: Ziphion, Haggi, Suni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi le Areli.
Aser naupasalhai chu: Imna, Isva, Isvi, Beria le an farnu Sera. Chun, Beria naupasalhai chu: Heber le Malkiel.
Hienghai hi Labanin a naunu Leah a ipêk Zilpah naupasalhai chu an nih, hienghai hi Jakob a neipêk a, mi sâwmparuk an nih.
Jakob nuhmei Rakil naupasal- hai chu: Josef le Benjamin.
Josef chun Aiguptaah naupasal Manasse le Ephraim chu a nei a, chuhai chu On khaw thiempu Potiphera naunu Asenathin ama a neipêk a nih.
Chun, Benjamin naupasalhai chu: Bela, Beker, Asbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim le Arda.
Hienghai hi Rakil naupasalhai Jakob a neipêkhai chu an nih; hienghai hi Jakob a neipêk a, an rêng chun sâwmpali an nih.
Chun, Dan naupa chu Husim.
Naphtali naupasalhai chu: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer le Sillem.
Hienghai hi Labanin a naunu Rakil kuoma a pêk Bilha naupasalhai chu an nih; hienghai hi Jakob a neipêk a, an rêng chun pasari an nih.
Jakob naupasalhai nuhmeihai tiem loin Jakob le Aiguptaa lût ve, a ṭhalbea suok po pohai chu, an rêng chun sâwmruk paruk an nih;
chun, Josefin Aiguptaa naupa- sal a neihai chu pahni an nih: Jakob sûnghai po po Aiguptaa lût chu sâwmsari an nih.
Gosen ram tieng lo khikhmu dingin Juda chu Josef kuomah Jakob- in a lo in fe hmasatir a: chuongchun, Gosen rama chun an lût tah a.
Chun, Josef chun a tawlailîr chu a siemrêl a, Gosenah a pa Israel tuok dingin a hang feh a: chun, a kuomah ân hriettir a, a ir a suktuoh a, sâwt fe a ir suktuoin a ṭap a.
Israel chun Josef kuomah, “Damin i la um a, i hmêl ka hmu nâwk ta lei hin tuhin chu nuom leh thi ta de ning,” a tih a.
Josef chun a unauhai le a pa sûnghai kuomah, “Hang fêng ka ta, Pharao hril ka ta, a kuomah, ‘Ka unauhai le ka pa sûnghai, Kanaan rama umhai kha, ka kuom an hung tlung tah;
anni chu ran vaituhai an ni leiin berâm vêngtuhai an nih a, an berâm ruolhai le an bâwng ruolhai le an nei po po an hung sawm vawng a nih,’ tiin, hang hril ka tih.
Chun, Pharao chun a ko cheu a, ‘Ieng sin am in thaw hlak?’ a ti pha cheu chun,

nangnîn, ‘I siehlawhai hi kan thlatuhai chenah naupang chite kan ni laia inthawk tu chen hin ran vaituhai kan nih,’ ti ro: chuongchun, Gosen ramah um thei in tih. Berâm vêngtu hrim hrim chu Aigupta mihai tirdak zâwngtak a ni sih a,” a tih a.
